code: import React from"react";import Data from"../../data/line_Chart_Data.json";import{ResponsiveContainer,XAxis,YAxis,CartesianGrid,Legend,Tooltip,Label,AreaChart,Area}from"recharts";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var AreaChartDiagram=function AreaChartDiagram(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{width:"100%",aspect:2,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(AreaChart,{width:500,height:800,data:Data,margin:{top:15,right:8,bottom:20},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("defs",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("linearGradient",{id:"student",x1:"0",y1:"0",x2:"0",y2:"1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("stop",{offset:"5%",stopColor:"red",stopOpacity:0.8}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("stop",{offset:"95%",stopColor:"red",stopOpacity:0})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("linearGradient",{id:"fees",x1:"0",y1:"0",x2:"0",y2:"1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("stop",{offset:"5%",stopColor:"green",stopOpacity:0.8}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("stop",{offset:"95%",stopColor:"green",stopOpacity:0})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:"name",interval:"preserveStartEnd",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Label,{value:"Programming Languages",position:"bottom",offset:0})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{tickCount:9,label:{value:"student  data",angle:-90,position:"insideLeft"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{strokeDasharray:"3 3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{wrapperStyle:{color:"#17a2b8"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Legend,{verticalAlign:"top"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Area,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"student",stroke:"red",fillOpacity:1,fill:"url(#student)",activeDot:{r:8}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Area,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"fees",stroke:"#82ca9d",fillOpacity:1,fill:"url(#fees)",activeDot:{r:8}})]})});};export default AreaChartDiagram;
